Shivah::

"Listen me!!!"said shivah"I'm pretty bored with this chat and I like 
to end this situation as sooner as posible and I guess that you like 
come back your home with your friends so I have an idea: I'll go out 
with one of your friends, I'll test the antivirus with your friend 
and If it fuction you will give us the antivirus and the information 
that you know about Megaton and I'll free your friends and you and 
your friends will leave forever our territory and never come back if 
you don't wanna die... Agree?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> OOC, I've still got alot of E-mails to go through and I'll finish 
tomorrow,
> If I've missed anything let me know and I'll try to correct it.
> 
> 
> 
> BIC- Lunarpine tried to hold back a laugh, the Predacons didn't 
seem to
> understand the seriousness of the situation. A loose virus, 
contaminated
> bots and the anti-virus at the front door and the Preds were to hot 
headed
> to open up and accept it. At the very least he expected them to try 
to
> overpower him. He stood a little disapointed that they were still 
hiding
> beneath the lava. "To live or die isn't my choice, it's entirely up 
to you."
> The wolfbot began to taunt, "Do you want to be the Predacon 
commander that
> lost his unit to a virus or do you want to live and find a nice 
violent
> battle to destroy yourself in?" It was the typical Predacon bravado.
> Predacon commanders seemed to have an attitude that they could lose 
a
> thousand bots in battle as long as they conquered an inch of land.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <airly2000@y...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Sunday, October 14, 2001 9:00 PM
> Subject: Re: Comm link with Lunarpine::
> 
> 
> > Shivah:
> >
> > "WE HAVE MORE THAN A WAY TO SURVIVE, STUPID MAMMAL-BOT !!!"said 
angry
> > Shivah"TELL ME DO YOU LIKE SEE THEM DEATH??????"
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Bullet stepped further back allowing the others a clear shot at 
the
> > mutant,
> > > he moved next to the dragons watching the action as it took 
place.
> > >
> > > Lunarpine listened carefully to Shivahs tone, he knew things
> > weren't going
> > > well inside. He wished he could be there to help out. "You heard
> > what I said
> > > Shivah, you bring them to me or no deal." There was no insurance
> > that Shivah
> > > would keep his word and being a predacon lowered that 
chance. "You
> > stay
> > > inside if you like, It wouldn't bother me one bit that Preds 
died
> > of the
> > > virus, My associates would be considered heros for killing all 
of
> > your
> > > kind." The wolfbot was playing on the Predacons sense of self
> > preservation
> > > to draw him out in the open.
